DESCRIPTION: Send enemies flying with a ferocious roar.
LEVEL_DESC: Deals %BV% + Defense multiplied by %D(multbasedefense * (basedefense + multdefense * lvl), multbasedefense, basedefense, multdefense, lvl)^ damage.
MAX_BONUS_DESC: Enemies are stunned for %T(stunduration / 1000, stunduration)^ seconds.
